description:
Power-hungry pirates terrorize innocent citizens once protected by Whitebeard, and Luffy`s nightmarish awakening sends him on a reckless rampage that could land him in an early grave!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Landing at the Maiden Island! The Harsh Reality Falls Upon Luffy!
Nyougashima Jouriku: Luffy o Semeru Kakoku na Genjitsu
Retour sur l`île des femmes. Dure réalité pour Luffy !
На острове женщин – жестокие муки Луффи
الهبوط في جزيرة العذارى! يستوعب لوفي الواقع الأليم!
女ヶ島上陸 ルフィを責める過酷な現実
